website_summaries.verdict: Best for beginners who want to sample a variety of oils that address different needs.
pros: Includes a few extra oils that aren’t tied directly to stress relief, including rosemary, tea tree and eucalyptus
Comes with an information card that explains the best uses for each oil
cons: Complaints that some leaked during shipment

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the base smell
customer_reviews.text: The size of the bottles are decent and they're study with tight screw cap lids. The box they come in is also a nice storage container. My issue is that all of the scents have a very menthol-like smell to them. Even the orange scent. The only oil that doesn't have as strong as a menthol smell is the frankincense but it's still kind of there. For me this doesn't work because it's hard to layer the scents as you just end up with menthol on top of menthol.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Seller take note........
customer_reviews.text: Lemongrass container empty when received. Not acceptable. Paid for eight full bottles and got seven full and one empty. Demand seller fulfill obligation or refund purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Tango

customer_reviews.title: but theyre really good. HERE's my rating of the best to my ...
customer_reviews.text: Four because some smell really similar to either one or two of the others, but theyre really good. HERE's my rating of the best to my least favorites. Best: Lavender, Peppermint, Orange Meh: Eucalyptus, Tea Tree, Rosemary Bad: Lemon Grass, Frankencense
customer_reviews.author: Majin

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I have used various brands of lavendar essential oils for years and I thought I would buy this sampler to try other essential oils. The lavender in the set I received did not smell anything like lavender. They claim that they use 100% essential oils but that does not appear to be accurate. I'm not sure what the other essential oils normally smell like so I can't judge the quality of them but I'm pretty certain that the lavender isn't as described. Buyer beware...
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Great sents and a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These Essential Oils smell great and are lasting a long time. When I finally had a chance to open the box and start using them it turns out one of the bottles seal had broken and it leaked everything out. Sadly it was the peppermint bottle and I think it would have been my favorite sent. Will buy these again once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: timothy green

customer_reviews.title: Smell fantastic! Nice packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought these on prime day for my candlemaking. They smell fantastic, and for this many scents the price was unbeatable. They are very strong, but not overly so. Outside of the tea tree, a scent I personally always find to be overly strong, none of them are overwhelming as long as you don't take a big whiff with the bottle right under your nose. They came in a little rectangular box, making for quick and easy storage. And thankfully, none of them leaked in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Goode

customer_reviews.title: Great smells, and amazing packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today for the zookkiTM diffuser I just bought (no this isn't sponsored😂). I love it! They were sent to me in a great, sturdy, little box and it had also descriptions of each of the scents on the packaging. I thought they were very nice, except for the frankincense. I don't know if it is just my opinion, but I don't like the smell that much. I will probably use it mixed in with a stronger scent like orange, just so that I can get the advantages of it without the smell😝. Besides that I do think they are just great!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Rollend

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is non existent
customer_reviews.text: Customer service is non existent I tried to get a hold of them three different times about one of my broken bottles that leaked all over the rest. Never got a reply. They sent me a “we would like to hear your feedback” and I replied to them from that message like it says to do if I have a problem. And now that message is gone from my inbox. Such a shame. This seemed like a really good product but it’s ruined with the awful customer service. 1/5 would not recommend...
customer_reviews.author: B Wade

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for a first-time user of essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Best buy for a first-time user of essential oils. Gives one a good idea of each scent and an explanation of each.
customer_reviews.author: Book Editor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy great natural health uses
customer_reviews.text: This stuff was amazing. The oils are all good quality. Use them so much. As rice wrap infusing, for steam when my guys are sick, as night steamer with lavender added for relaxation, in diffusers, on bulbs, in auto, add to natural disinfectant for scent, make my own Scent spray, add to laundry with vinegar as softener. Add to a wash cloth and put into dryer, added to home air filter, made a little satchel to relax.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Good oils but Lavender had shattered and evaporated
customer_reviews.text: The box came sealed and looked perfect. The oils are really good but I noticed a strong smell when I opened the box. I realized the lavender had been completely shattered and had to wash off the rest of the glass bottles. I can tell it happened a while ago because the bottom of the box wasn't wet from the bottle of lavender oil so it must have evaporated overtime even though I could still smell it. I would give them five stars if it wasn't for this incident and the inconvenience it causes.
customer_reviews.author: Flgirl22

customer_reviews.title: One of my oil bottles was empty upon opening
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the options that came in this kit which is why I purchased it. Upon arrival, I discovered that my rosemary oil bottle was completely empty. The seal was unbroken so it couldn't have just leaked out. It was as if an empty bottle had just been placed in the box amongst the others. All my other oils we're good though. If you don't mind potentially being shorted a bottle of oil, this is a good kit.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these oils--they are weak and have an off smell. The lemon grass was especially nasty. The packaging was nice though. If you like packaging this is it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Super potent, the packaging was very nice and keeps them all organized in a row! My favorite oil is peppermint (for vacuuming) and second place would be lemongrass. They're all really good.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan C

customer_reviews.title: Check your box once you receive it to make sure the correct oils are there.
customer_reviews.text: It's packaged beautifully loved that there is detailed information about each oil in the lid of the box. The only unsatisfying part was I received two eucalyptus instead of an orange it was supposed to be top 8 essential oils. That's why I gave 4 stars instead of 5. As far as the scents go they have a beautiful scent isn't too over powering. I totally understand mistakes happen.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Sturgeon

customer_reviews.title: Great oil scents
customer_reviews.text: All 8 oils come in a small cardboard box, luckily none of them were broken because they do have the possibility to hit against each other. I have only used one oil so far, but as soon as you take the plastic wrapping off you can smell them! This is the perfect pack if you are unsure which scents you like, and you get to try them all.
customer_reviews.author: Micah C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and they smell great
customer_reviews.text: I am far from an essential oils enthusiast or expert, but I have been very happy with this set. All 8 essential oils have a great and unique smell that carries quite far with a good diffuser. Again, I cannot speak on whether these oils are "pure" but they do a great job of making my home smell good. I would definitely recommend this set for those who are simply looking to get their home smelling good.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ambriz

customer_reviews.title: I triple checked to make sure that these were 100% ...
customer_reviews.text: I triple checked to make sure that these were 100% oils as described in the title and description and image – I will keep this short and simple, these oils are in NO way 100% oil. It was a gamble to purchase this set and it did not pay off.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Day

customer_reviews.title: Standard oil; cheap packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Lids to bottles are cheap and break apart. Most of the bottles leaked during shipping. If you screw the cap on too tight, the top of the cap will break off leaving you unable to re-seal the bottle properly, leading to a complete waste. There's nothing wrong with the oil and scents, just the packaging and bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These were the first oils I bought but they compare to the doterra products but a lot cheaper. Not all the oils are great but I prefer oils over spraying harsh cleaning products in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Greg lopez

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as expected.Tea tree oil previously opened and diluted.
customer_reviews.text: The tea tree oil was already opened and seems very weak and watery compared to other brands I've purchased. It also has very little color compared to other brands. The lemongrass and sweet orange have a strong smell and seem to be ok, but the lavender, eucalyptus, and peppermint also seem a bit weak. For the price I can't complain too much, but even the NOW brand from GNC seems to be better quality oils, at a comparable price. Will not be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Harris

customer_reviews.title: Daughters Love
customer_reviews.text: Bought for daughter and she uses every day! Got her hooked now as this was the 1st defusser and oils ever bought. Shucks, little girl turning in to young lady! Guess I better switch modes as to who I have living at home but thrilled that she loves this. Face it, I'm a man and know nothing about this young lady stuff, but got it right this time! Thanks for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Father of 2

customer_reviews.title: Some are great, some are not so great.
customer_reviews.text: Some are great, some are not so great. I've tried all but the lavender, the lemon grass if god awful, can't stand it. But the peppermint is great, very soothing. All the others are somewhere inbetween. I would agree, this is a great starter pack, find what you like and then buy them specifically. Will be sticking to peppermint, Eucalyptus, and maybe tea tree or orange from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: roxy0990

customer_reviews.title: but I can tell you that you can easily know what fragrance she's been using in the humidifier/diffuser
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my SO. I don't have any experience with Aromatherapy, but I can tell you that you can easily know what fragrance she's been using in the humidifier/diffuser, she uses two or three drops and that is more than enough, and so far I have found all the aromas that she has used to be very pleasant (lavender, lemon grass, eucalyptus).
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Smells / oils pretty disappointing. The rosemary was actually completely empty (?) upon opening package. Was going to return - but didn't want to go through the trouble. The lavender oil smelled best, and I would order it if sold separately. Overall would not purchase this exact product again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel in Boston

customer_reviews.title: Bought by mistake
customer_reviews.text: I was looking at essential oils and as I often do, put items in my cart to go back to later. I must have accidently it the "buy it now" button because I was surprised when the package arrived. Well like I said, I was just looking and today. 2 months later I finally opened the package. Yes, I could have returned them but I thought what the heck, they were cheap and maybe I can figure out what to do with them. Honestly none of them smell good but according to the description they can be useful . Guess I'll figure it out when I have the time to google each of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some Smell Good and Some Don't
customer_reviews.text: The box and overall presentation of the essential oils is very nice and visually pleasing. The scents of them though are more divided. I will say that quite a few of the scents are very pleasant and nice, my personal favorite being the citrus orange. Other scents though, like the lavender, are a bit more potent which I did not find as nice. Overall though I would recommend this for essential oils or as a gift since most of the oils do smell pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Nato S.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the smell of each scent
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smell of each scent. Not sure if I would use them on my skin, but I definitely use them on the diffuser, and the smell is really nice. The advertisement includes 8 scents, but it only comes with 6. It is missing rosemary and frankincense oils. That's the reason I am not giving 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great oils, but one of the bottles were empty
customer_reviews.text: We bought these essential oils for our diffuser and we were having so much fun using all of the different scents! I also really liked that the packaging includes an insert that describes all of the different scents and what they are good for (ex. lemongrass is energizing, lavender is for relaxation, etc.). But when we went to try out the Peppermint oil, the bottle was completely empty! That being said, if all of the oils were in the set, then it would have been 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew J Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Changes you moods & improve sinus problems.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice aromas from these oils. I had to use 3 to 5 drops to actually smell them but I have sinus issues so take it for what it means. I will reorder this product again. I highly recommend these oils. Excellent value. UPDATE: Have used these oils for the past 3 days and have noticed, when using the eucalyptus oil, my sinus congestion lessens throughout the day. HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Xaja Mykil

customer_reviews.title: Great Intro to Essential Oils!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Potent and long-lasting fragrance. I wish they sold larger, separate bottles of everything in this pack! I had to buy a different brand when I ran out of tea tree. :(
customer_reviews.author: S. LeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good oils
customer_reviews.text: I am not new to the essential oil life, but I also feel that sometimes the cost of oils are out of control so I am always on the look out for new products to try. These are standard for making up roller recipes and to diffuse. They all smell like they should and came without any damage or spills.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set for anybody!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little set of essential oils for anybody. Great if your first getting into oil or gift for anybody that wants some natural scents floating around. The set lasts a good bit of time. I top of it all you can’t go wrong for the price!!!! Mix and match to get cool combined essential oils!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zaffarano

customer_reviews.title: Unnatural, awful smelling!
customer_reviews.text: Not one of these smells natural. After opening each them to smell them, I wish I could send them all back. Incredibly disappointed as I was looking forward to using them in my brand new diffuser. Strongly do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ESpi

customer_reviews.title: Love these oils
customer_reviews.text: Love these oils. Smell great in my diffuser and not too expensive like a lot of essential oils can be. Just a few drops and house smells amazing. Or they can easily be combined together let's say orange and eucalyptus. Wonderful. They last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brickman

customer_reviews.title: leaked during shipping
customer_reviews.text: When I received these the whole bottle of lavender was empty and the peppermint was missing 1/4. Otherwise great purchase for a beginner set
customer_reviews.author: KayMort

customer_reviews.title: Amazing deal for amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I did not have high hopes for these. They’re very fairly priced so I wasn’t expecting quality. I just needed some essential oils ASAP for an art project I was doing. I was very pleasantly surprised. The scents are very rich without being overwhelming. The bottles are very nicely sized. I’m very happy with my purchase. There’s a few scents I don’t like, but that’s my own preference. It has nothing to do with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Liv W

customer_reviews.title: Not the same smell as previous purchase...MUSTY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in early 2017 and again last year. There is a DISTINCT difference in the smell between the original ones and the new bottles (also with updated labels). All of the new bottles have a musky/must smell to them, which is very unpleasant. Even though the original set is over 2 years old, in a side-by-side comparison I would gladly take them over the new crap that I received. I will look elsewhere from now on...not even worth the cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: MRL

customer_reviews.title: Empty and chipped bottles
customer_reviews.text: If I could give no starts I would. I got my oils and the box was nice and the bottles looked nicely packaged. However upon inspection I found the tea tree oil to be completely empty. No signs of leaking or anything. Just empty. Also one of the other bottles was severely chipped but not far enough to cause a leak yet. The lavender oil smells aweful! It smells chemically and a really bad lingering oder. I don't recommend these oils
customer_reviews.author: Amber carter

customer_reviews.title: Not as promised without the lavendar
customer_reviews.text: While the delivery time and packaging of this product were okay, we are disappointed that the product was not as advertised. We received two peppermint vials and no lavender vials. We were interested in trying out specifically the lavender because it's the most calming of the fragrances that this list offered. We wanted you to use this for relaxation and the absence of lavender defeats the purpose of this sample set. Because this product is not as advertised and therefore we felt misled, we are giving the product one star.
customer_reviews.author: tennistyroone

customer_reviews.title: I hope I will not face this situation again
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed!!! I just open my new boxe of Radha Beauty essential oils. When I open my peppermint bottle and put some drops at my defuser . Guess What!!! The plastic dispenser disc fell off and the oil poured into the diffuser, wasting the oil. I have been using this product for a year and am very disappointed. I hope I will not face this situation again.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda

customer_reviews.title: Just fine, hard to get drops out of some
customer_reviews.text: I like the scents but some of them are really difficult to get anything out. I have to shake and jiggle and tap it just the right way for a drip. I thought I got some empty ones but I can see the liquid in the bottle. You certainly don't have to worry about pouring too much. They were all intact upon arrival. My parents bought this and they received theirs broken, which seemed to be a common problem in the reviews. So 50/50 chance I guess.
customer_reviews.author: atkinsak

customer_reviews.title: Good but be careful when opening
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used all of the different scents, but I like what I have used so far. Be careful when you open the box, I had one of the bottles (tea tree oil) that was leaking because the lid wasn't on right. It is the one scent I don't like, but everything now smells like it.
customer_reviews.author: Flora Smith

customer_reviews.title: forget the diffuser . . .
customer_reviews.text: Use this in the toilet after a "oh my goodness what did I eat?" event. The odor is immediately gone and the bathroom is left smelling nice without the harmful environmental issues of aerosol. Since started using this essential oils in the toilet nose has been happier. I used it also in the drain of a multi-stall bathroom that smelled like a septic tank :-O I put about a half dozen drops in the drain and then poured a few cupfulls of water down and the bathroom now is not offensive.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Funky smell - Not 100% pure essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Essential oils do not seem to be 100% pure essential oils as advertised. Should have realized the price was too good to be true. Funky smell . At first a few scents seemed alright but then I realized they all had a strange chemical smell. Questionably even safe .
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I'm new to oils, but everything smells as it should. My girlfriend is more experienced, and she agrees. I used the peppermint, lavender, eucalyptus and Healing Solutions Rosemary essential oil with Now foods grapeseed and jojoba oils to make a massage oil for my girlfriend and it worked very well. Every oil seemed to have the plant properties and effects they should have to help with pain and inflammation. Everything came packaged well, nothing broken leaking. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NycGal02

customer_reviews.title: Empty Oil
customer_reviews.text: I just opened my box to make a blend of three essential oils and the orange bottle was completely empty. Very upsetting when it was the last of the blend to add and the first use of my diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Nile

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing starter set to begin your journey into essential oils. I found that mixing the oils into coconut oil/base oil did the trick. Overall loved the kit because it had such a variety, giving you a small amount of each and seeing which one you liked and possibly order again. My favorites in this kit was the Tea Tree and the Lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline On

customer_reviews.title: Smell so good. Research smells for toxicity to animals and small babies though!
customer_reviews.text: This set has a great variety of oils. The oils have good strong smells and work great in our humidifier. We have not tried all of the scents yet, but the ones we have tried have smelled fantastic and I expect the rest of them to be just as nice. We have to wait until we no longer have a cat to use some of the scents as several of them are toxic to animals and small babies.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: No oil in one of the bottles
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of scents and the description of each oil. The only issue I had is one of bottles was empty and I really wanted to try it. It was the tea tree oil. The bottle was never open and when I opened it there was no oil in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G Comeau

customer_reviews.title: A very diverse set of aromas, the smell is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the seller created a package of 6 different aromas so that I can decide which ones I like the most. Once I have finished trying all 6 I will order the ones I want in larger quantities. If you are on the border about deciding once scent or another this is a way to try 6 different ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ecoined

customer_reviews.title: I’d rather pay more for a much better oil
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for. More expensive brands smell and perform a lot better. I’m used to that level of essential oil and can’t enjoy Radha’s because it does not compare to more expensive competitors at all, but I guess that’s what I wanted to know.
customer_reviews.author: C. I. James

customer_reviews.title: Great little set.
customer_reviews.text: I love these essential oils for anything and everything. I’m not one of those people that essentially oils fix everything but I bought these to help with different symptoms while pregnant since you can’t take medicine and they seemed to help a lot. I do not use now once my son was born though as they can be harmful to infants in some cases (any eo) and I am back on birth control and they can effect that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Taylor

customer_reviews.title: First one was great. I ran out of lavender
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this oil set twice now. First one was great. I ran out of lavender, so decided to order another set. The lavender in the set I just received smells terrible!!! I don’t know what went wrong, but I can’t use it. It does not even smell close to lavender which is scary. Now I don’t want to use the other bottles in the set. I can’t return the set now either because I have away the bottles I don’t use. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMatt

customer_reviews.title: Aromatherapy
customer_reviews.text: I always use this whenever i feel like being fancy in my tub. Few drops of this goes a long way! I love the lavender and orange, used separately. And when i feel like i'm gonna get sick, i drop eucalyptus oil in my shower floor and let the steam from my hot water carry the scent and i will feel much better afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Jackieline dela cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great oil, leaky lids
customer_reviews.text: The oils work well and have a good scent. The bottles themselves are poorly sealed and leak easily. Fortunately, the seller of this product is very good and sent me a whole new box, even though I had only asked for one bottle to be replaced that had a cracked lid. In the second box they sent me, some of the bottles had also leaked, but none were cracked. Good product, but they need to work on the lids so they don't leak. Would be a perfect product otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brugnoni

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Came perfectly packaged, no leaking oils, and wrapped securely. The oils are highly fragrant and passed the “paper test”. I have purchased many oils from Amazon and would repurchase oils from Radha Beauty. The Radha fractioned coconut it oil is also wonderful to use as a carrier oil for these essential oils. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: MTDreams

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this months ago, and only recently opened it. (It got lost in storage.) 3 bottles were empty upon opening, and I emailed Radha's customer service, and they immediately sent me the missing bottles for free. They were incredibly nice, and prompt with their response. I don't believe in the supposed health benefits and whatnot 100%, I just like the smell. All of the scents smell nice to me, if not sometimes it's a bit overpowering to me, but I probably put one too many drops in my diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: maggie

customer_reviews.title: Beware: half of these oils are unsafe for cats
customer_reviews.text: These oils are very nice, but I had to throw half of them away (the Eucalyptus, Orange, Peppermint, and Tea Tree) because I discovered that diffusing them is toxic to cats. You can find articles that talk about this online. Maybe Radha Beauty has a pet-friendly collection?
customer_reviews.author: coronadogibson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these oils
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these oils. This is the third set we've purchased (one form home, one for my office, one for a friend). The lid gives information on each oil, and what it is used for (relaxation, help with breathing, etc.). I can't imagine buying anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good set of oils with strong scents
customer_reviews.text: Good set of oils with strong scents I love it already! I smelled all and I’m not disappointed at all. Shipped fast. Great amount of oils I love that it also has a nice description of each oil listed on the box! Helpful and handy
customer_reviews.author: pitbulllover

customer_reviews.title: it's 'OK'
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled - Presentation is perfect - smells great and price is right! However, the smell is not long lasting like Young Living - I was hoping (based on comments) that this was the perfect alternative. I use it mostly in a diffuser and after a couple of hours, it doesn't smell anymore?!?! Need to add more oil to kickstart the fragrance - at the pace I a going, I am better off with Young Living where a little goes a long way No regrets - just had to try it for the price :D
customer_reviews.author: ♡ Z

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful selection of oils to experiment with!
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful selection of scents for my super diffuser! I admit I am lavish with the drops as I really love the scent in the air and I think maybe they are the reason for a better night’s sleep!! I combine a few sometimes, such as lemongrass and peppermint... It is fun to play with different combinations. One of my favourite ones is cinnamon, clove (which I had already), and orange..,.. a lovely scent for the kitchen/family room, reminiscent of the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: These oils work very well and smell great, however
customer_reviews.text: These oils work very well and smell great, however, I gave them three stars since one of the oils arrived in a used condition. The seal of the tea tree oil was opened when my oils arrived. All the rest were sealed. I think that if you're going to send someone a brand new item that they've paid for, you need to guarantee that all items are brand new and sealed.
customer_reviews.author: maria

customer_reviews.title: Great variety, some variety not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Great variety of types for different functions and effects, but out of 6, just three were strong enough to fill out the room with their smell, Lemongrass, Eucalyptus and Peppermint. The others are barely noticeable, unless you add much more drops. I'm using an ultrasonic diffuser. As they have other uses as: Aromatherapy, Custom Massage and Body Oils, Vaporizer, Diffusion, Oil Burner, Inhalation, Compress, Perfume, Blends, Spa and Home Care, Cleaning Products, probably they will be fine for it, but not enough concentrated for diffusion use.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Walker MS

customer_reviews.title: Great oils!
customer_reviews.text: Love the oils, and I can smell it all over my bedrooms upstairs and down the hallway. I've purchased them 3 times and when they're gone, will reorder because the price is fantastic! When I can't wait, I get only 2 bottles for Iwhat I pay here for 8 bottles; on sale of course at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm very disappointed because peppermint was one of my favorite and the ...
customer_reviews.text: A few of the bottles are empty. The peppermint oil was completely empty when it newly open. I'm very disappointed because peppermint was one of my favorite and the reason I buy.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these
customer_reviews.text: These oils are great, they seem very high quality (I'm not really an expert though so that doesn't mean much coming from me haha). This was my first purchase of essential oils, and it won't be my last, I really enjoy the benefits these provide me. I think one o them was leaking slightly when my package arrived, but these oils are made to evaporate so it pretty much cleaned itself up after I let them sit on the table for a little, so no biggie there. They were all relatively full so I don't think much product leaked.
customer_reviews.author: Amber L.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: So I really like these oils. When I originally received the package, 7/8 oils were fine, but the lavender was completely empty. I sent the seller feedback and quickly got a response that they will be sending me a filled bottle of lavender! So as long as I receive that, I'm on board with this product. Great price and great opportunity to try essential oils out!
customer_reviews.author: Jocelin

customer_reviews.title: Love this set of essential oils
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of essential oils. Great for making soap, bath bombs, or dropping in the bath tub. I have ordered this twice and never had any leaks from the bottles after shipping. The box it comes in also has a description for what each oil does. Nice variety and amount for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Essential Oil User
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used Essential Oils, and wanted to give it a try. Mainly because I’m getting frequent headaches that can last a day or two which I think is because of the weather. I’m excited to try them, so stay tuned as I will post another review once I do. These arrived today and I love the packaging, but noticed I have 2 Peppermint oils and NO Rosemary. Not too concerned about it as the price was wonderful, however what will I be missing out on not having Rosemary?
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Kristeen Pellowski

customer_reviews.title: The 5/8 oils smell unpleasant
customer_reviews.text: The smells are somewhat appalling. The tea tree oil is very unpleasant, the lavender doesn't smell like true lavender and has a terrible smell. The lemongrass is very sweet smelling along with the orange that smells like a lollipop (I can deal with this). The rosemary is very strong and smells like true rosemary. I was very disappointed in the scents and can only tolerate the smell of the rosemary, orange, and lemon grass out of the full set. None are relaxing, just a decent smell compared to the rest that smell like garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Not concentrated enough for a diffuser.
customer_reviews.text: These oils are not strong enough for a diffuser...they get watered down and do not put out barely a fragrance...even in a small bathroom. I put in at least 30 drops and it made no effect on the potency of the fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Smith

customer_reviews.title: ALL THE OILS SMELL AWFUL! DON’T RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: Smelled AWFUL!! Very DISAPPOINTED. I order ORGANIC RADHA OILS & ESSENTIAL OILS A LOT. NONE of THESE OILS SMELL the WAY they’re SUPPOSED 2! I’ve ordered these oils a while back 4 my bf as a BIRTHDAY GIFT. She didn’t say anything bad, obviously she’s being polite. I FEEL BAD NOW GIVING HER THESE!! I’m GETTING MY $$ BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Vegan Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Great Smelling essential oils
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for awhile now and still have a lot left! I love all the varieties and came in a cute box that i still have them in. The essential oil scents are nice and work well in my diffuser.
customer_reviews.author: Ckayy

customer_reviews.title: 🤢Smell of ammonia contacting FDA ⚠️
customer_reviews.text: ⚠️Do NOT buy these. They smell like ammonia. I smelled all of them and I was sick for half a day. Returning and contacting FDA I think they are probably dangerous ⚠️⚠️
customer_reviews.author: rayray

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. I use these every day for a verity of house hold jobs. From cleaning to bug repellent.! Thank you for your product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mattick

customer_reviews.title: Great oils. Broken bottle on delivery
customer_reviews.text: I love these oils. I got them with my diffuser when i first ordered one. I was very excited to see that they had a top 8 with rosemary and frankincense. However, my order arrived today and the rosemary bottle was shattered. When i looked over the reviews i see that I’m not alone of getting packages with broken bottles. The way it’s packed needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: First time using these oils, i am on my second kit now. Bought three for my family members. This product is great! Oils dont last to long. But other then that i recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: She likes it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these essential oils as a birthday gift for my sister to go along with the Cool Mist Humidifier Ultrasonic that I also purchased. She really likes the essential oil says they all smell very nice. Favorites: peppermint and lavender.
customer_reviews.author: Zeva

customer_reviews.title: hi
customer_reviews.text: hi! i first purchased this product last month (april), and received all 8 scents in a beautiful black packaging, in green-ish color lettering. i loved it so much! the scents have been very helpful for a calming nights rest and overall relaxation. i purchased it again and received it today! but lo and behold, not in the same packaging, AND was missing two scents (rosemary and frankincense). please keep to your word of 8 scents and not 6, or explain to customers when there is a shortage so we aren’t left disappointed when we receive your products! thank you in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Durham

customer_reviews.title: YASSSS
customer_reviews.text: I don't think there is much to say lol it is exactly what you expect :) Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these, it is a great assortment, especially for someone new to essential oils like me. But they do smell a bit "chemical-ly" and I have to wonder if they are actually 100% pure? IDK, maybe it is just b/c I am a novice with essential oils...I do use them on my dryer balls and that seems to be the best way to use them that I have found so far (vs. diffusing them).
customer_reviews.author: dblomom

customer_reviews.title: I love the numerous scented oils that are included in this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the numerous scented oils that are included in this kit. I have tried almost all of them except for the orange smell. My top two favorite scented oils are: Lavender and Peppermint. They are soothing and relaxing especially while I am trying to fall asleep. They really do help with calming you and help with stress. I find myself falling asleep much faster these days just by having this in my bedroom. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: alw88

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad for pets
customer_reviews.text: Great scents. Good quality. The only issue I have is that I had to give half of them away because of my cats. I'm sure they have a warning somewhere, but it should be bigger and explain why you can't use it when you have cats. It puts the scent in the air, and it falls on items in your house, on the floor, on you, on your cats, and if they lick anything at all it could harm them or it can irritate their skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jobug

customer_reviews.title: 100% Pure is NOT this inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: Speaking as a licensed, professional Massage Therapist, there is NO WAY POSSIBLE these "100% Pure and Therapeutic grade" are what they claim! I have been using Aromatherapy for many years, and I thought I would try these...what a waste of money and time. The scent they are supposed to produce is non-existent, and if it had one, after a few minutes it was gone. I used in a diffuser, and there was no scent what so ever, and I ended up using more oil than recommended, because I wanted to smell it, maybe even just a tiny hint, but again...nothing. I won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Anna J.

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely scented oils
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended to me by my massage therapist. They are superior to any other essential oils I have tried in that the scents are strong and pleasant. I could tell as soon as I opened the box that they would be better because I could smell them right away. I use them in my humidifier, my oil warmer and in my homemade all purpose cleaner. I will definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: CindyH

customer_reviews.title: Caps leaked when product arrived
customer_reviews.text: I like the essential oils but two of the bottles were leaking when they arrived. I didn't contact Amazon fast enough, which is my own fault, so I wasn't able to get a refund. But either way, the caps shouldn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: A nice assortment. They all smell very pleasant
customer_reviews.text: A nice assortment. They all smell very pleasant. I have used a few drops in water in a small mist diffuser, in the bath and shower(peppermint and eucalyptus), and rubbed a few drops in my hands and applied to my skin like perfume (mostly the lemongrass and lavender).
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a package of essential oil previously through a different company. That one was received with one broken. Such a mess. This one was much better. Packaged securely and they all made it fine. They smell exactly as expected and work well in my diffuser
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with empty bottle
customer_reviews.text: I was SO happy with this order until I just this very minute tried to use the eucalyptus oil and found to my surprise that it was empty. I had never opened it before. I snapped the cap off to take a sniff and as I suspected it smelled like nothing. They sent me an empty bottle. I’m very very disappointed as this was the one I was most looking forward to!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this purchase. The scent doesn't last long at all! I even added more drops and still it only lasted maybe a 1/2 hour! Definitely won't be purchasing front Radha Beauty again!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Mira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing use!
customer_reviews.text: I used the rosemary for my very first time using it, it smelled like one of those medicine patches that you would use. It wasn’t bad at all, it smelled very smoothing. I recommend opening the window a bit if you don’t want your whole room and hallway to smell like the oil. Other than that, it was amazing and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: With the exception of 1 scent, I think they smell great. Honestly, it’s probably personal preference why I dislike one of them but still it smelled off. I usually mix the oils in water and put them into a humidifier and enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B.

customer_reviews.title: PLEASANT SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Radha Beauty Aromatherapy set as a gift. My bother uses 2-3 drops of the essential oils in his newly Syntus Essential Oil Diffuser and he loves the aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Cat47

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see what the hype was about with using an oil diffuser. I decided to purchase these oils because of the ratings and I'm so glad I did. I love the many choice of oils and the cost you can't beat. I mainly use the peppermint in my oil diffuser and it has helped significantly with my migrains.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 oils in my package, not 6.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Prime Day and got it today. I just unwrapped and opened it and there are only 4 oils in there, instead of the 6. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Empty Bottle!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday present to myself for my oil diffuser. Unfortunately, when it arrived today the frankincense bottle was empty!!! The seal was not broken, but the bottle was empty. I am very disappointed and will not buy again because of missing product!!!
customer_reviews.author: LDAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Good variety for first time user
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying essential oils. I wasn't really sure what scents I would like so I got this box and it was a great price. I really like the peppermint and eucalyptus oils. I have sinus issues and these help me sleep better at night. I bought these along with the URPOWER 300ml 7 Color Changing Essential Oil diffuser. The Lemongrass had leaked a little bit when I opened the box. It smells like lemon Pledge to me. The tea tree is my least favorite. I can barely tolerate that one. It was a nice sample box to see what scents I like. Now I can buy bigger bottles of the ones I know I like.
customer_reviews.author: We are Normal

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the scents
customer_reviews.text: Some of these were good- the lavender and orange are nice. Many of the others smell pretty similar- as another reviewer mentioned they all seem to have a faint eucalyptus smell to them- which is fine for the eucalyptus one, but not what I was looking for in the others. The peppermint one also smells like peppermint, but it is quite strong. Anyway, I probably wouldnt order again.
customer_reviews.author: HD4386

product_meta.title: Radha Beauty Aromatherapy Top 8 Essential Oils 100% Pure & Therapeutic Grade - Basic Sampler Gift Set & Kit (Lavender, Tea Tree, Eucalyptus, Lemongrass, Orange, Peppermint, Frankincense and Rosemary)
product_meta.description:
Our Aromatherapy Top 8 Essential Oil Set has eight (10 mL each) essential oils. One of the many things we love about essential oils is their versatility. Our oils can be used individually or combined for aromatherapy, skin healing and conditioning, and even repelling insects! It's the perfect set for traveling, presents, or experiencing a little bit of everything in your oil collection.

(1). Lavender: The essence of pure calmness and relaxation with a light, uplifting scent
(2). Peppermint: Calming aroma will liven up the mind, body, and soul
(3). Tea Tree: Antiseptic properties, invigorating and refreshing scent
(4). Eucalyptus: Naturally anti-inflammatory, great for the sinus and its refreshing scent
(5). Lemongrass: A great herb for inducing relaxation and balance for the mind
(6). Orange: Promotes positive attitudes and induces relaxation for a calm spirit
(7). Frankincense: Aids in relaxation and sleep, re-balances the mind
(8). Rosemary: Stimulates hair growth, regulates oily and dry skin

Directions:
- Dilute with a carrier oil and topically apply to areas that need therapeutic attention
- Diffuse with our essential oil diffuser
- Add 2-3 drops into a warm bath
- Add a few drops to a spray bottle to freshen up your home
feature_bullets: PERFECT GIFT SET: Help your friends and family discover the endless wellness benefits of pure essential oils. Each aromatherapy essential oils set is beautifully presented in a gift box, making it the perfect gift for anyone in need of relaxation. It is also the perfect starter set for anyone starting out with essential oils. Perfect stocking stuffer.

100% PURE THERAPEUTIC GRADE ESSENTIAL OILS: A collection of our finest oils. This set includes 8-10mL bottles of tea tree, eucalyptus, lavender, frankincense, rosemary, orange, and lemongrass essential oil. No chemical additives, fillers, artificial fragrances, or synthetic dyes added. Bottled in the USA.

HIGHLY VERSATILE: When used with an aroma diffuser, our 100% Pure essential oils will fill the environment in any room with the best aroma and bring the beauty and smell of nature to you. Ideal for topical use, massage with a carrier oil, household use, and aromatherapy relaxation.

DIY FRAGRANCE: Our set can be used for relaxation, beauty care, and home cleaning. You can use your favorite essential oil for aromatherapy, custom massage, body oils, vaporizer, diffusion, spa, home care, and cleaning products. Can be used to make skincare, natural perfumes, roll ons, soaps, candles, cosmetics, bath bombs, potpourri, and more.
